title: What is the English translation of मेरे पास दिमाग है? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is quite interesting in terms of how the question’s placed…as it implies differently under varied situations, circumstances and conditions… The one’s that come to the fore with translations and the events that they may be associated with(in brackets) to lend logic and sense to the translations: I have a mind I have a brain I can think straight(and am not a silent observer) I’m capable of thinking(of the correct thing to do) I can use my head/ I do use my head(to judge & emerge) I can take a call(right from wrong) There can be several more, which I’ll be glad to share if the exact situations or conditions are specified. Hope this helps for now…!!

Hi :) Literal Translation is I got a brainI have a brain.However, this Hindi statement is used in a context where the speaker wants to comvey the following: I have the sense to discriminate.I have the potential to understand.I do have the knowledge.I have the brains to analyze good/bad, right /wrong.I am aware of what's going.I have the capacity to think and act in accordance
